name: invalidationContext(forPreferredLayoutAttributes:withOriginalAttributes:)
desc: Retrieves a context object that identifies the portions of the layout that should change in response to dynamic cell changes.
declaration:
func invalidationContext(forPreferredLayoutAttributes preferredAttributes: UICollectionViewLayoutAttributes, 
  withOriginalAttributes originalAttributes: UICollectionViewLayoutAttributes) -> UICollectionViewLayoutInvalidationContext
